## Constitution Compliance Review

**Code Quality Standards (Principle I)**:

- [ ] CONST001 Functions limited to 50 lines or less
- [ ] CONST002 Cyclomatic complexity ≤10 per function
- [ ] CONST003 SOLID principles followed
- [ ] CONST004 Code review approval received
- [ ] CONST005 Public APIs documented
- [ ] CONST006 Linting passes with zero warnings
- [ ] CONST007 Type checking enabled and passes
- [ ] CONST008 Technical debt tracked (if any)

**Testing Standards (Principle II)**:

- [ ] CONST009 Tests written before implementation (TDD)
- [ ] CONST010 All tests initially failed (Red state)
- [ ] CONST011 Code coverage ≥80% (95% for critical paths)
- [ ] CONST012 Test pyramid respected (70% unit, 20% integration, 10% E2E)
- [ ] CONST013 Tests are deterministic (no flaky tests)
- [ ] CONST014 Contract tests for all APIs
- [ ] CONST015 Performance regression tests included
- [ ] CONST016 All tests pass in CI

**UX Consistency (Principle III)**:

- [ ] CONST017 Design system components used
- [ ] CONST018 WCAG 2.1 Level AA compliance verified
- [ ] CONST019 Keyboard navigation tested
- [ ] CONST020 Screen reader compatibility tested
- [ ] CONST021 Responsive design tested (320px, 768px, 1024px+)
- [ ] CONST022 User feedback provided for all actions
- [ ] CONST023 Loading states for operations >300ms
- [ ] CONST024 Error messages are user-friendly

**Performance Requirements (Principle IV)**:

- [ ] CONST025 API responses: p50 <200ms, p95 <500ms, p99 <1s
- [ ] CONST026 Page load: FCP <1.5s, TTI <3.5s on 3G
- [ ] CONST027 Memory usage within limits (<100MB mobile, <200MB web)
- [ ] CONST028 Database queries optimized and indexed
- [ ] CONST029 Caching implemented where appropriate
- [ ] CONST030 Performance monitoring configured
- [ ] CONST031 No performance regression detected

- [ ] CHK001 First checklist item with clear action

- [ ] CHK003 Third checklist item
